content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS result


--Identify the inferred data types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS result';

--Define columns and datatypes
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        trip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS result;

SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH(
        trip_amount FLOAT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS result;
